mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Reply WHERE BOARDNUM = #{boardnum} order by REPLYDATE asc
select emp.userid , EMPNO, EMPPWD,ENAME,EMPTEL,DEPTCODE,TEAMCODE,POSCODE,EMPAPPROVE from reply ,emp where reply.userid = emp.userid and reply.boardnum = #{boardnum} order by reply.REPLYDATE asc

select reply.USERID,USERPHOTO,USEREMAIL,BIRTH,USERADDR,USERTEL,USERMOBILE,HIREDATE,FIREDATE from reply ,empinfo where reply.userid = empinfo.userid and reply.boardnum = #{boardnum} order by reply.REPLYDATE asc
